name: Poltergeist Bloody Mary (Monochrome)
description:
Special Halloween Spookiez based on real life hauntings. 

"Bloody Mary appears to individuals or groups who ritualistically invoke her name in an act of catoptromancy. 
Bloody Mary apparition appears as a corpse, witch, or ghost and is sometimes seen covered in blood.
The lore surrounding the ritual states that participants may endure the apparition screaming at them, cursing them, strangling them, stealing their soul, drinking their blood, or scratching their eyes out." (Wikipedia)

@LuisMiranda4D
